tool.name: RNA fragment size
tool.description: calculates the fragment size for each gene/transcript
tool.help:
RNA_fragment_size.py ++++++++++++++++++++
Calculate fragment size for each gene/transcript. For each transcript, it will report : 1) Number of fragment that was used to estimate mean, median, std (see below). 2) mean of fragment size 3) median of fragment size 4) stdev of fragment size.
Inputs ++++++
Input BAM/SAM file Alignment file in BAM/SAM format.
Reference gene model Reference gene model in BED format. Must be strandard 12-column BED file. [required]
Minimum mapping quality Minimum mapping quality for an alignment to be considered as "uniquely mapped". default=30
Minimum number of fragments Minimum number of fragments. default=3
@ABOUT@
